languages.text: Set Veil tear to 0 and remove Warp Burn and Immolate the Soul effects from all allies in Relaying area.

traits.locale_text: Set Veil tear to 0 and remove Warp Burn and Immolate the Soul effects from all allies in Relaying area.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil degradation{/g} changes to 0. The {g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}warp burn{/g} and {g|f:26be6a9ad4c540a4921f25834a2f420f}soul burn{/g} effects are removed from all allies within the 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が0になる。
{g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}歪みの炎{/g}および{g|f:26be6a9ad4c540a4921f25834a2f420f}ソウルバーン{/g}の効果は、サイバーレイヴンの周囲4マス以内のすべての味方から取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} becomes 0. The {g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}warp burn{/g} and {g|f:26be6a9ad4c540a4921f25834a2f420f}soul burn{/g} effects are removed from all allies within the 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が0になる。
{g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}歪みの炎{/g}および{g|f:26be6a9ad4c540a4921f25834a2f420f}ソウルバーン{/g}の効果は、サイバーレイヴンの周囲4マス以内のすべての味方から取り除かれる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} ändert sich auf 0. Die Effekte {g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}Warp-Brand{/g} und {g|f:26be6a9ad4c540a4921f25834a2f420f}Seelenbrand{/g} werden von allen Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben entfernt.

Die Effekte {g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}Warp-Brand{/g} und {g|f:26be6a9ad4c540a4921f25834a2f420f}Seelenbrand{/g} werden von allen Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben entfernt.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Örtü bozulması{/g} 0'a eşitlenir. Ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimlerin üzerindeki {g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}öte yanığı{/g} ve {g|f:26be6a9ad4c540a4921f25834a2f420f}ruh yanığı{/g} etkileri ortadan kalkar.

Ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimlerin üzerindeki {g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}öte yanığı{/g} ve {g|f:26be6a9ad4c540a4921f25834a2f420f}ruh yanığı{/g} etkileri ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g} passe à 0. Les effets {g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}Combustion du Warp{/g} et {g|f:26be6a9ad4c540a4921f25834a2f420f}Brûlure de l'âme{/g} sont supprimés sur tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} cambia a 0. Se eliminan los efectos de {g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}quemadura de la disformidad{/g} y {g|f:26be6a9ad4c540a4921f25834a2f420f}quemadura del alma{/g} de todos los aliados situados en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del psicocuervo.
